main: ^Oh! You're the brave soul that brought Ezra back to us. I cannot thank you enough for that.
^Plenty of folk would have left him out there if they were in your shoes. And now you're helping us, too.
^Maria asked you to investigate the church, didn't she? I built that place, you know. Preached there for some 20 years, and they ran me out of it.
^They've been taking folks up there for some time. Doing something with them. In my house of worship! It's a disgrace.
^All I ask is that you see if anyone's left. I need to know.
^Is there anything else you can tell me?
heavyhint: ^Whatever they're doing in my church, it's evil. It will be more deadly than whatever monsters or demons you might have seen thus far. Be wary.
